comment: Main text block containing Chinese characters in vertical columns, including large heading characters and smaller explanatory text, with annotations and phonetic transcriptions (e.g., '切', '文五'). The layout is traditional right-to-left, top-to-bottom. Includes small marginal notes such as '大十七' and '袁和'. The text appears to be from a classical Chinese dictionary or lexicographical work, possibly related to the *Shuowen Jiezi* or similar.
